reviewtext: This hub is pretty good. A little on the light side, it might slide on the surface a little, but the hub does a nice job at controling the network. This hub is good for linking home computers to a single ISP (DSL or Cable)it will also let you share a dial up account, but your better off using it for some kind of broadband. On the account of being light weight you can use some kind of sticky mounts (Double Sided,The kind where all you have to do if pull on a tab and the adheasive should come right off with out damaging the surface).
